headline: How the Narrative Around Ralph Lauren Is Shifting Amid Rising Targets and Brand Momentum
summary: Ralph Lauren’s updated narrative now embeds a slightly higher fair value estimate of about $369.46 per share, up from roughly $366.75, as analysts lean into stronger brand momentum and improving long term earnings visibility. While the revenue growth outlook has only eased fractionally to around 5.12% from approximately 5.14%, a wave of more constructive Street research in the mid to high $300s and even low $400s underscores growing confidence that management’s multi year plan remains...
